about_the_game:
The 4th of low-price series of KimidoriSoft! "Food Delivery Service" Appears!

For video creators and streamers
KIMIDORI SOFT permits monetization through partner programs using KIMIDORI SOFT games.

Overview
You are a delivery man for a food delivery service.
A friend invites you to Nodaira-cho Town, a town that is rumored to be making a lot of money these days, and you work as a delivery person there, but little by little you get caught up in strange incidents.
This is an adventure game that makes you think about what is the right thing to do.

Features
  • Choices
    The ending changes depending on the player's choice, but I made it so that the player can start over right away, because I think it would be hard to play the game over and over again and make all the choices. There are exceptions.

  • About the game
    This is a horror game of the type that is scary when you know what it means. There are no direct horror expressions, but there are some violent expressions and murders, so please be careful.

  • Auto save
    Progress is automatically saved at key points, allowing you to continue playing from where you left off.

    # Approximate play time to complete the game is about 1 hour.

    This is a horror game of the type that is scary when you know what it means. There are no direct horror expressions, but there are some violent expressions and murders, so please be careful.

name: Food Delivery Service

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core2Quad Q8400 @ 2.6 GHz or AMD Athlon II X4 620 @ 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 650 or AMD Radeon HD 7750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core2Quad Q8400 @ 2.6 GHz or AMD Athlon II X4 620 @ 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX1050Ti or AMD Radeon RX560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: A friend invites you to Nodaira-cho Town, a town that is rumored to be making a lot of money these days, and you work as a delivery person there, but little by little you get caught up in strange incidents. This is an adventure game that makes you think about what is the right thing to do.
